summary: Suhas S recently upgraded to the Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra and finds it to be an absolute powerhouse with its Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 processor, long battery life, stunning 200MP camera, and S-Pen support. However, the weight and size make one-handed use uncomfortable, and the presence of bloatware and the high price tag are drawbacks.
pros: Insanely powerful processor (great for gaming and productivity)
Stunning 200MP camera with incredible zoom capabilities
Long battery life with fast charging
S-Pen support is unique and useful
cons: Weight and size make one-handed use uncomfortable
Presence of bloatware in Samsung's One UI
name: Suhas S
